snippet: Indonesia’s Chris John won by unanimous decision over Shoji Kimura to retain his World Boxing Association featherweight title for the 16th time in a one-sided fight in Singapore.
lead_paragraph: Indonesia’s Chris John won by unanimous decision over Shoji Kimura to retain his World Boxing Association featherweight title for the 16th time in a one-sided fight in Singapore.

headline.seo: Featherweight Champion Chris John Wins in Singapore
